text: Ndipo munthu wamwamuna wokhulupirira wa m’gulu la anthu a Farawo amene adabisa chikhulupiriro chake adati, “Kodi inu mudzapha munthu chifukwa chakuti wanena kuti Ambuye wanga ndi Mulungu pamene iye wadza kwa inu ndi zizindikiro zooneka zochokera kwa Ambuye wanu? Ndipo ngati iye ndi wabodza tchimo likhale pa iye yekha koma ngati iye ali kunena zoona, tsoka limene anena lidzagwa pa inu. Ndithudi Mulungu satsogolera munthu woswa malamulo ndi wabodza.”
